mapper.update: UPDATE oa_button SET s_method=#{sMethod},s_btn_id=#{sBtnId}, s_btn_name=#{sBtnName},s_btn_value=#{sBtnValue}, s_excbutton_id=#{sExcbuttonId}, s_excfield=#{sExcfield}, i_is_refresh=#{iIsRefresh}, i_is_checkbus=#{iIsCheckbus}, i_is_defend=#{iIsDefend}, i_is_ntko=#{iIsNtko}, i_is_print=#{iIsPrint},i_is_printpreview=#{iIsPrintpreview},i_is_saveas=#{iIsSaveas}, i_is_save=#{iIsSave},i_is_new=#{iIsNew},i_is_close=#{iIsClose}, i_is_open=#{iIsOpen},i_is_edit=#{iIsEdit},i_is_copy=#{iIsCopy}, i_is_saverevision=#{iIsSaverevision},i_is_showrevision=#{iIsShowrevision}, i_is_addread=#{iIsAddread} ,i_is_base=#{iIsBase} WHERE i_id = #{iId}
mapper.select: select s_btn_id, s_btn_name, s_btn_value, s_excbutton_id, s_excfield, i_is_refresh, i_is_checkbus, i_is_defend, i_is_ntko, i_is_print,i_is_printpreview,i_is_saveas,i_is_save,i_is_new,i_is_close,i_is_open,i_is_edit,i_is_copy,i_is_saverevision,i_is_showrevision, i_is_addread,i_is_base from oa_button where i_id = #{id}

select i_id, s_btn_id, s_btn_name, s_btn_value, s_excbutton_id, s_excfield, i_is_refresh, i_is_checkbus, i_is_defend, i_is_ntko, i_is_print,i_is_printpreview,i_is_saveas,i_is_save,i_is_new,i_is_close,i_is_open,i_is_edit,i_is_copy,i_is_saverevision,i_is_showrevision, i_is_addread,i_is_base from oa_button
